title: WMATA MOMENTUM
description: Momentum includes a set of seven pivotal investments, called Metro 2025.  These investments are eight-car trains, station improvements, Metrobus Priority Corridor Network, Metrobus fleet expansion, next generation customer communications, special track infrastructure to provide operational flexibility, and a new Blue Line connection.
justification: The region is projected to continue to grow over the coming decades, and this growth will place even more pressure on a system that is already nearing capacity. To ensure the system continues to meet the regionâ€™s mobility needs as well as support the competitiveness of the region, Metro must  continue to rehabilitate the system and plan for future  growth.
